import { Fragment, useState } from 'react' import { Dialog, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { ExclamationTriangleIcon, XMarkIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline' function Modal() { const [open, setOpen] = useState(true) return (
Deactivate account

Are you sure you want to deactivate your account? All of your data will be permanently removed from our servers forever. This action cannot be undone.

) } export default Modal;
